Title: Relates to the adoption and enforcement of rules by public school districts for the control of use, and access to, school grounds and facilities
Summary: Provides that public school districts shall adopt and enforce rules for the control of use, and access to, school grounds and facilities; requires the posting of "no trespassing" signs by such school districts.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the posting of "no trespassing" signs by public school districts
